trans-unit.source: Controls and selects the properties that are retrieved when peeking or receiving messages from a message queue.
trans-unit.target: 控制，並選取從訊息佇列的窺視或接收訊息時，會擷取的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting the MessagePropertyFilter on a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> instance controls the set of properties that are retrieved when peeking or receiving a message.
trans-unit.target: 在設定 MessagePropertyFilter<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>執行個體可控制的其內或接收訊息時，會擷取的屬性集。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>

trans-unit.source: The filter is set on the instance of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> that retrieves the message information.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體上設定篩選<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>所擷取的訊息資訊。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>

trans-unit.source: When you set a MessagePropertyFilter Boolean-valued member to `false`, you prevent the information of the associated <xref:System.Messaging.Message> property from being retrieved by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定 MessagePropertyFilter 布林值的成員為`false`，避免<xref:System.Messaging.Message>從正在擷取<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>屬性</xref:System.Messaging.Message>相關的資訊

trans-unit.source: There are several filter properties that are not Boolean values.
trans-unit.target: 有幾個不是布林值的篩選條件屬性。

trans-unit.source: They are integer values that get or set the default sizes of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Label%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的預設大小的整數值都<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，或<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Label%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Label%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Retrieving a limited set of properties helps improve performance because smaller amounts of data are transferred from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 擷取一組有限的屬性，可協助改善效能，因為較少量的資料會從佇列傳送。

trans-unit.source: When setting a property on MessagePropertyFilter, you are only indicating whether that property is retrieved when a message is received or peeked.
trans-unit.target: MessagePropertyFilter 上設定的屬性，只會指出是否要在接收或窺視訊息時，擷取該屬性。

trans-unit.source: You are not changing the associated property value for the <xref:System.Messaging.Message>.
trans-unit.target: 您不會變更<xref:System.Messaging.Message>.</xref:System.Messaging.Message>的相關聯的屬性值

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.%23ctor%2A> constructor sets all filter properties to their default values, which for the Boolean values is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.%23ctor%2A>建構函式會設定所有篩選條件屬性為其預設值，這的布林值是`false`。</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the constructor topic for the defaults assigned to the integer-valued properties.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱指派給整數值的屬性，預設值的建構函式主題。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter"></xref> class and sets default values for all properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter"></xref>類別，並設定所有屬性的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The MessagePropertyFilter constructor sets all Boolean values to `false` and sets the integer-valued properties to the default values shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: MessagePropertyFilter 建構函式會將所有的布林值設定為`false`並將整數值的屬性設定為下表中所顯示的預設值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>|1024| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>|255| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>|255|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |預設值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>|&1024;年 | |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>|&255; | |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>|255|</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A></xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A></xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the type of acknowledgment messages requested by the sending application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別指定所傳送的應用程式要求的通知訊息的類型。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of acknowledgment defines when acknowledgments are returned.
trans-unit.target: 通知類型的定義傳回認可的時機。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property before sending the message to request a specific type of acknowledgment.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，才能傳送訊息來要求特定類型的通知。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the type of acknowledgment messages the system posts in the administration queue, which determines when acknowledgments are generated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指定訊息在管理佇列，這會決定產生的通知時系統傳送通知的型別。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Acknowledgments are returned from the destination queue and posted as messages to the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A> specified by the original message.
trans-unit.target: 通知會傳回從目的地佇列，並張貼訊息至<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A>原始訊息所指定。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of acknowledgment generated depends on what was requested.
trans-unit.target: 產生的認可類型取決於要求。

trans-unit.source: Read the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property when receiving a message from an administration queue to verify the status of the message originally sent to the message queue.
trans-unit.target: 讀取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A?displayProperty=fullName>接收來自管理佇列來確認訊息原本傳送到訊息佇列的狀態訊息時的屬性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the name of the queue that receives system-generated acknowledgments.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別指定名稱的佇列會接收由系統產生的通知。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class contains additional, application-specific information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別包含的其他應用程式特定資訊。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AppSpecific%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ArrivedTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ArrivedTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ArrivedTime%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class indicates when the message arrived at the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ArrivedTime%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指出訊息何時抵達目的端佇列的時間。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.ArrivedTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is local time, adjusted from GMT, of the computer on which the message is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 這是調整 gmt，擷取訊息之電腦的當地時間。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ArrivedTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ArrivedTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AttachSenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AttachSenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AttachSenderId%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should be or has been attached to the message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AttachSenderId%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指定是否<xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>應該是或已附加至訊息。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.AttachSenderId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set by Message Queuing and is used by the receiving Queue Manager to verify whether the sender has access rights to a queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>由訊息佇列設定，用來驗證寄件者是否有佇列的存取權限所接收的佇列管理員。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AttachSenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AttachSenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Authenticated%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Authenticated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Authenticated%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class is used by the receiving application to determine if authentication was requested.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Authenticated%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別可由接收應用程式來判斷是否已要求驗證。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If authentication was requested and the message is in the queue, then the message is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經要求驗證，而且訊息在佇列中，已驗證訊息。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to look at the properties of a message and determine whether a message failed authentication.
trans-unit.target: 您不可能以查看訊息的屬性並判斷訊息是否驗證失敗。

trans-unit.source: Messages that fail authentication are discarded and are not delivered to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 驗證失敗的訊息會予以捨棄，而且不會傳遞至佇列。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Authenticated%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Authenticated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the name of the cryptographic provider used to generate the digital signature of the message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderName%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指定用來產生訊息的數位簽章的密碼編譯提供者的名稱。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is typically used when working with foreign queues.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>通常是使用外部佇列時。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: 非 Microsoft Message Queuing 的佇列系統中存在的外部索引的佇列。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Message Queuing 與透過連接器應用程式的這類佇列通訊。

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AuthenticationProviderType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class represents the serialized contents of the message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別代表已序列化訊息的內容。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: The body can contain up to 4 MB of data.
trans-unit.target: 主體可以包含最多為 4 MB 的資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets all Boolean filter values to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, so that no message properties are retrieved when receiving a message.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定所有的布林值篩選值<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，以便接收訊息時，會擷取任何訊息屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use ClearAll to set all <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> Boolean properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定所有使用 ClearAll<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>布林屬性，以`false`。</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>

trans-unit.source: This causes no message properties to be retrieved when receiving messages.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致沒有接收訊息時要擷取的訊息屬性。

trans-unit.source: ClearAll does not affect the values for <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>, or <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ClearAll 不會影響的值<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>，或<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>

trans-unit.source: After calling ClearAll, it is necessary to set at least one filter property to `true` in order to receive data related to a message.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫之後 ClearAll，就必須將至少一個篩選屬性設定為`true`才能接收訊息的相關資料。

trans-unit.source: You can either set individual properties to `true`, or you can call <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.SetDefaults%2A> or <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.SetAll%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以以任一設定個別屬性`true`，或您可以呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.SetDefaults%2A>或<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.SetAll%2A>.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.SetAll%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.SetDefaults%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: 建立物件的淺層複本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object> that represents an instance of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Object>代表的執行個體<xref href="System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter"></xref>類別</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class is required when an application sets a message property that is typically set by Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別時，需要應用程式設定通常會設定由訊息佇列的訊息屬性。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is used in the following two instances: - When a message is passed by a connector application, the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is required for the sending and receiving applications to interpret the security and acknowledgment properties of the message.
trans-unit.target: 在下列兩個執行個體:-連線應用程式，以傳遞訊息時<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>做是為了要解譯訊息的安全性與認可屬性的傳送與接收應用程式。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - When sending application-encrypted messages, the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property informs Message Queuing to use the symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: -當傳送應用程式加密的訊息、<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性會通知訊息佇列 」 使用對稱金鑰。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ConnectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies a message identifier that is used by acknowledgment and report messages to reference the original message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指定可由認可和報告訊息來參考原始訊息的訊息識別項。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: It provides an application-defined identifier that the receiving application can use to sort messages.
trans-unit.target: 它提供的應用程式定義的識別項，接收應用程式可以用來排序訊息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the default body buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的預設本文緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The default body size specifies the number of bytes to allocate for the message's body contents.
trans-unit.target: 預設主體大小指定為訊息的本文內容配置的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class represents the serialized contents of the message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別代表已序列化訊息的內容。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: The body can contain up to 4 MB of data.
trans-unit.target: 主體可以包含最多為 4 MB 的資料。

trans-unit.source: Restricting the body size can improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 限制的主體大小可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: The default body buffer size to create when the message is received.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立接收訊息時預設本文緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1024 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1024 個位元組。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is negative.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值為負數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the default extension buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的預設延伸緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The default extension size specifies the number of bytes to allocate for the message's extension.
trans-unit.target: 預設的延伸大小指定為訊息的延伸模組配置的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class represents the additional, application-defined information associated with the message, such as a binary large object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別代表其他應用程式定義資訊訊息，例如二進位大型物件相關聯。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the application to interpret the contents of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 它負責解譯<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>.</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>內容的應用程式

trans-unit.source: The default extension buffer size to create when the message is received.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立接收訊息時預設延伸緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is 255 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 255 個位元組。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is negative.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值為負數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the default label buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的預設標籤緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The default label size specifies the number of bytes to allocate for the message's label.
trans-unit.target: 預設標籤大小指定為訊息的標籤配置的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Label%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the label of the message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Label%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指定訊息的標籤。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Label%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default label buffer size to create when the message is received.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收訊息時建立預設標籤緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is 255 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 255 個位元組。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is negative.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值為負數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class identifies the original destination queue of the message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationQueue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會識別訊息的原始目的佇列。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is typically used to determine the original destination of a message that is in a journal or dead-letter queue.
trans-unit.target: 它通常用來判斷是日誌或寄不出的信件佇列中訊息的原始目的端。

trans-unit.source: It can also be used when sending a response message back to a response queue.
trans-unit.target: 它也可用時的回應訊息傳送至回應佇列。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the symmetric key used to encrypt the message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指定用來加密訊息的對稱金鑰。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is required when you send application-encrypted messages, or when you send encrypted messages to a foreign queue.
trans-unit.target: 當您傳送應用程式加密的訊息，或是外部佇列來傳送加密的訊息時是必要。

trans-unit.source: A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: 非 Microsoft Message Queuing 的佇列系統中存在的外部索引的佇列。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Message Queuing 與透過連接器應用程式的這類佇列通訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.DestinationSymmetricKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DigitalSignature%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.DigitalSignature%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DigitalSignature%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the digital signature used to authenticate the message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DigitalSignature%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指定用來驗證訊息的數位簽章。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.DigitalSignature%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, it is generated and set by Message Queuing when the sending application requests authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，它會產生並傳送應用程式要求驗證時，由訊息佇列設定。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.DigitalSignature%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.DigitalSignature%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.EncryptionAlgorithm%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.EncryptionAlgorithm%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: If a message is private, it is encrypted before it is sent and decrypted when it is received.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息是私人的它會加密再傳送並接收時解密。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.EncryptionAlgorithm%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the algorithm used to encrypt the message body of a private message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.EncryptionAlgorithm%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指定用來加密私用訊息之訊息主體的演算法。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.EncryptionAlgorithm%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.EncryptionAlgorithm%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.EncryptionAlgorithm%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class provides for additional application-defined information that is associated with the message, like a large binary object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會提供訊息，例如大型二進位物件相關聯的其他應用程式定義的資訊。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the receiving application to interpret the contents of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 它是解譯<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>.</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A>內容接收的應用程式的責任

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Extension%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.HashAlgorithm%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class identifies the hashing algorithm Message Queuing uses when authenticating messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.HashAlgorithm%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別識別驗證訊息時訊息佇列使用的雜湊演算法。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.HashAlgorithm%2A>

trans-unit.source: The hashing algorithm is also used when creating a digital signature for a message.
trans-unit.target: 建立訊息的數位簽章時，也會使用雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.HashAlgorithm%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.HashAlgorithm%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Priority%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class affects how Message Queuing handles the message while it is en route, as well as where the message is placed in the queue when it reaches its destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Priority%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會影響訊息佇列處理訊息，而路由，方式與在到達其目的地時，將會放在佇列的訊息。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Priority%2A>

trans-unit.source: Message priority can only be set meaningfully for non-transactional messages.
trans-unit.target: 非交易式訊息只能設定有意義地加以訊息優先順序。

trans-unit.source: The priority for transactional messages is automatically set to zero, which causes transactional message priority to be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 交易式訊息的優先順序會自動設定為零，這會導致交易式訊息的優先權會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Priority%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Recoverable%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Recoverable%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Recoverable%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class indicates whether delivery of a message is guaranteed, even if a computer crashes while the message is en route to the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Recoverable%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指出是否保證訊息的傳遞，即使目的地佇列來路由訊息時電腦當機。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.Recoverable%2A>

trans-unit.source: If delivery of a message is guaranteed, the message is stored locally at every step until the message is successfully forwarded to the next computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息的傳遞保證，訊息儲存在本機上的每一個步驟，直到訊息成功轉送至下一部電腦。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Recoverable%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to `true` on the message could affect the throughput.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Recoverable%2A?displayProperty=fullName>至`true`訊息上可能會影響輸送量。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.Recoverable%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ResponseQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ResponseQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ResponseQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class identifies the queue that receives application-generated response messages that are sent back to the sending application by the receiving application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.ResponseQueue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別識別接收會傳回到傳送應用程式所接收的應用程式的應用程式所產生的回應訊息的佇列。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.ResponseQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Response queues are specified by the sending application when the application sends its messages.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式傳送其訊息時所傳送的應用程式指定回應佇列。

trans-unit.source: Any available queue can be specified as a response queue.
trans-unit.target: 任何可用的佇列都可以指定為回應佇列。

trans-unit.source: Messages returned to the response queue are application-specific.
trans-unit.target: 傳回至回應佇列的訊息是特定應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The application must define what is in the messages as well as what is to be done when a message is received.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式必須定義什麼是訊息中以及執行接收到訊息的動作。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.ResponseQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class is used primarily by the receiving queue manager when authenticating a message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別主要供接收佇列管理員在驗證訊息。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is set by Message Queuing and is used by the queue manager to verify who sent the message and that the sender has access rights to the receiving queue.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會設定由訊息佇列，並可由 「 佇列管理員來確認訊息寄件者，以及寄件者可以接收佇列的存取權限。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the version of Message Queuing used to send the message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指定用來傳送訊息的訊息佇列的版本。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is important to be aware of when using features like transaction processing, which is only supported by Message Queuing version 2.0 and later, or digital signatures, which are used to authenticate messages sent by version 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 屬性是重要時使用的功能，例如異動處理才支援 Message Queuing 2.0 版和更新版本，或數位簽章可用來驗證版本 1.0 所傳送的訊息應該注意的項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set by the sending queue manager when the message is sent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>設定所傳送的佇列管理員傳送訊息時。</xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Specifies to retrieve all message properties when receiving a message.
trans-unit.target: 指定要接收訊息時，擷取所有的訊息屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use SetAll to set all Boolean <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> properties to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定所有布林使用 SetAll<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>

trans-unit.source: This causes all message properties to be retrieved when receiving messages.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致接收訊息時要擷取的所有訊息屬性。

trans-unit.source: SetAll does not affect the values for <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>, or <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: SetAll 不會影響的值<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>，或<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>

trans-unit.source: After calling SetAll, you can set individual filter values to `false` in order to restrict the properties retrieved when the message is received.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 SetAll 之後, 您可以設定個別的篩選值`false`為了限制接收訊息時所擷取的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the filter values of common Message Queuing properties to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the integer-valued properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 設定訊息佇列的通用屬性，來篩選值<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>以及為其預設值的整數值屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use SetDefaults to set the following <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> Boolean-valued properties to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 使用來進行下列設定 SetDefaults<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>布林值屬性，以`true`。</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>

trans-unit.source: These are the most common properties a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> will typically interact with the following: - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AcknowledgeType%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Acknowledgment%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AdministrationQueue%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Body%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Id%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Label%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.LookupId%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.MessageType%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.ResponseQueue%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseJournalQueue%2A> SetDefaults sets the properties in the following table to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 這些是最常見的屬性<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>通常會與下列互動:- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AcknowledgeType%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Acknowledgment%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AdministrationQueue%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Body%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Id%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Label%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.LookupId%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.MessageType%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.ResponseQueue%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseJournalQueue%2A>SetDefaults 成為其預設值表中設定的屬性。</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseJournalQueue%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.ResponseQueue%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.MessageType%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.LookupId%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Label%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Id%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Body%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AdministrationQueue%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Acknowledgment%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AcknowledgeType%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>|1024| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>|255| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>|255| The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents a <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> on which SetDefaults has been called.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |預設值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>|&1024;年 | |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>|&255; | |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>|&255; | <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性代表<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>呼叫的目標 SetDefaults 已經被。</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別指定訊息起源所在的電腦。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the total time in seconds for a sent message to be received from the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別指定的總時間 （秒） 傳送到從目的地佇列等候接收訊息。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A>

trans-unit.source: The time limit for the message to be retrieved from the target queue includes the time spent getting to the destination queue, plus the time spent waiting in the queue before the message is retrieved by an application.
trans-unit.target: 要從目標佇列擷取訊息的時間限制包括到達目的地佇列，花費的時間加上應用程式擷取訊息之前的佇列中等候所花費的時間。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies a time limit in seconds from the time the message is sent for it to reach the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別以秒為單位，才能到達目的端佇列傳送訊息的時間從指定的時間限制。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class identifies the transaction that sent the message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會識別在傳送訊息的交易。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this property within a receiving application to verify that a message was sent as part of a specific transaction.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性，接收應用程式內確認訊息已傳送的特定交易的一部分。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class identifies the transaction status queue on the source computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會識別來源電腦上的交易狀態佇列。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is used for sending acknowledgment messages back to the sending application.
trans-unit.target: 屬性用於傳送認可訊息傳回給傳送應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The transaction status queue is used by connector applications when receiving transactional messages sent to a foreign queue.
trans-unit.target: 連接器應用程式接收傳送至外部佇列的交易式訊息時，會使用的交易狀態佇列。

trans-unit.source: A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: 非 Microsoft Message Queuing 的佇列系統中存在的外部索引的佇列。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Message Queuing 與透過連接器應用程式的這類佇列通訊。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether the message needs to be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指定是否需要驗證訊息。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to look at the properties of a message and determine whether a message failed authentication.
trans-unit.target: 您不可能以查看訊息的屬性並判斷訊息是否驗證失敗。

trans-unit.source: Messages that fail authentication are discarded and are not delivered to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 驗證失敗的訊息會予以捨棄，而且不會傳遞至佇列。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要接收<xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資訊; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether a copy of the message should be kept in a machine journal on the originating computer.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要擷取<xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時接收或窺視訊息的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether to track the route of a message as it moves toward its destination queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別會指定是否要向其目的地佇列為時加以追蹤訊息的路由。</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `true`, each time the original message passes through a Message Queuing routing server, a Message Queuing-generated report message is sent to the system report queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`，每次原始訊息通過訊息佇列路由伺服器，訊息佇列所產生的報告訊息傳送至系統的報告佇列。

trans-unit.source: Using tracing involves setting up Active Directory and specifying a report queue for the Message Queuing enterprise.
trans-unit.target: 使用追蹤牽涉到設定 Active Directory，並指定訊息佇列企業報告佇列。

trans-unit.source: These settings are configured by the administrator.
trans-unit.target: 系統管理員可以設定這些設定。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
